title: How do I keep "messges" app in LIGHT theme while device has DARK theme enabled
content:
My Pixel 2XL has DARK theme enabled. 

However I want to keep certain apps like GMAIL and MESSAGES (SMS)with the light theme.I was able to do this before. In the GMAIL app settings I am able to do this under the Settings>General Settings. However this seems to have been removed from the MESSAGES app in the last 2 updates.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
